cast.overview: A bounty hunter pursues a former Mafia accountant who embezzled $15 million of mob money. He is also being chased by a rival bounty hunter, the F.B.I., and his old mob boss after jumping bail.
cast.title: Midnight Run

cast.overview: NYPD cop John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her offices Christmas Party, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.
cast.title: Die Hard

details.biography: Terry Ray is an American actor, screenwriter and playwright. As a screenwriter, he teamed up with director Larry LaFond on the 2002 short film Gaydar. He created, wrote and starred in Here TV's first original sitcom, From Here on Out and co-created Here TV's game show Modd Couples. He also co-wrote the PixL movie The Joneses Unplugged starring Mischa Barton and Sean Faris.
details.name: Terry Ray
